apiservice.name: Aesir E-Commerce - User Webservice
apiservice.author: Aesir
apiservice.description: Web service to maintain the users of the B2B application.

create.description: This operation creates a new Aesir E-Commerce User

field.name: id
field.description: User ERP ID. Also stored as Employee Number. It will be stored as erp.<id> for future reference

field.name: username
field.description:
Username to login with.
This field is required for roles with login option

field.name: password
field.description:
Password to login with.
This field is required for roles with login option

field.name: role_id
field.description: Role for this user

field.name: name
field.description: Name of the user

field.name: name2
field.description: Name of the user, line 2

field.name: printed_name
field.description: Name to print for this user (referential)

field.name: company_id
field.description:
Company ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: department_id
field.description:
Department ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: address_name1
field.description: Address name

field.name: address_name2
field.description: Address name 2

field.name: address_line1
field.description:
Actual address, first line.
When this field is set, the address_line1, zip, city and country_code fields need to be provided

field.name: address_line2
field.description: Actual address, second line

field.name: zip
field.description:
Address zip code.
When this field is set, the address_line1, zip, city and country_code fields need to be provided

field.name: city
field.description:
Address city.
When this field is set, the address_line1, zip, city and country_code fields need to be provided

field.name: country_code
field.description:
Address country.
When this field is set, the address_line1, zip, city and country_code fields need to be provided

field.name: phone
field.description: Contact phone

field.name: email
field.description:
Email of the user.
When no email is provided, the no_email field needs to be specifically set to true

field.name: no_email
field.description:
When true, it generates a random email for this user to indicate the user has no valid email.
If set, the email field will be ignored.

field.name: send_email
field.description: When false, it will not generate any kind of emails to this user

resource.description: New User internal ID upon success, zero on error

list.description: This operation lists all Aesir E-Commerce Users

field.name: id
field.description: Internal user ID

field.name: id_syncref
field.description: Combined user IDs

field.name: username
field.description: Username to login with

field.name: role_id
field.description: Role ID of this User

field.name: name
field.description: User name

field.name: name2
field.description: Name of the user, line 2

field.name: printed_name
field.description: Name to print for this user (referential)

field.name: company_id
field.description: Owner company id

field.name: company_id_syncref
field.description: Owner company combined IDs

field.name: department_id
field.description: Owner department id

field.name: department_id_syncref
field.description: Owner department combined IDs

field.name: address_name1
field.description: Address name

field.name: address_name2
field.description: Address name 2

field.name: address_line1
field.description: Actual address, first line

field.name: address_line2
field.description: Actual address, second line

field.name: zip
field.description: Address zip code

field.name: city
field.description: Address city

field.name: country_code
field.description: Address country

field.name: phone
field.description: Contact phone

field.name: email
field.description: Email of the user

field.name: no_email
field.description: When true, it generates a random email for this user to indicate the user has no valid email

field.name: send_email
field.description: When false, it will not generate any kind of emails to this user

field.name: blocked
field.description: User with blocked access to the site when true

resource.description: Name to print for this user (referential)
When true, it generates a random email for this user to indicate the user has no valid email
When false, it will not generate any kind of emails to this user
User with blocked access to the site when true
Start displaying from a certain item in the list
Total number of pages of items
Limit the number of listed items
Sort list by field and direction

item.description: This operation displays a single Aesir E-Commerce User

field.name: id
field.description:
User ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: Name to print for this user (referential)
When true, it generates a random email for this user to indicate the user has no valid email
When false, it will not generate any kind of emails to this user
User with blocked access to the site when true
Default delivery address of this user (internal ID)
Default delivery address of this user (other IDs)
Delivery addresses of this user (internal IDs)
Delivery addresses of this user (other IDs - comma separated when multiple)

update.description: This operation updates Aesir E-Commerce User

field.name: id
field.description:
User ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: erp_id
field.description: Set or update the User ERP ID. Also stored as Employee Number. It will be stored as erp.<id> for future reference

field.name: username
field.description:
Username to login with.
This field is required for roles with login option

field.name: password
field.description: Password to login with.

field.name: role_id
field.description: Role for this user

field.name: name
field.description: Name of the user

field.name: name2
field.description: Name of the user, line 2

field.name: printed_name
field.description: Name to print for this user (referential)

field.name: company_id
field.description:
Company ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: department_id
field.description:
Department ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: address_name1
field.description: Address name

field.name: address_name2
field.description: Address name 2

field.name: address_line1
field.description:
Actual address, first line.
When this field is set, the address_line1, zip, city and country_code fields need to be provided

field.name: address_line2
field.description: Actual address, second line

field.name: zip
field.description:
Address zip code.
When this field is set, the address_line1, zip, city and country_code fields need to be provided

field.name: city
field.description:
Address city.
When this field is set, the address_line1, zip, city and country_code fields need to be provided

field.name: country_code
field.description:
Address country.
When this field is set, the address_line1, zip, city and country_code fields need to be provided

field.name: phone
field.description: Contact phone

field.name: email
field.description:
Email of the user.
When no email is provided, the no_email field needs to be specifically set to true

field.name: no_email
field.description:
When true, it generates a random email for this user to indicate the user has no valid email.
If set, the email field will be ignored.

field.name: send_email
field.description: When false, it will not generate any kind of emails to this user

resource.description: User internal ID upon success, zero on error

delete.description: This operation deletes Aesir E-Commerce User(s).

field.name: id
field.description:
User ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: True upon success, false on error

block.description: This task enables you to set specific Users as blocked.

field.name: id
field.description:
User ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: User internal ID upon success, zero on error

unblock.description: This task enables you to set specific Users as unblocked.

field.description:
